Hey, iwill mod some mods based on all your ideas, but first i must know how to mod (for newest ksp wersion) and how to use various modding programs like Blender, or Unity.

But anyways, i have a plugin suggestion, that is if with this plugin installed, can somehow render all the KSP mods compatipable to the newest ksp version, i know that is easier said than done, but if make a cfg/something that stores data for all mods can render it compatipable (must update at every new ksp update).

What is your ideas, or something about my idea?

I'm wondering how to get decent swing wings for a thunderbird one replica i am making as i would like some better aero lifting at lower speeds but lower drag at higher speeds, also do you know much about the mk4 fuselage, as i'm having trouble getting any of the fuel parts for it to show up thanks. also good luck with any modding

It's not possible to make a universal plugin that makes all other plugins compatible.

The closest thing to this is a Library with an API, which do exist in the modding community (The Firespitter plugin is an example of a Library with an API).  Assuming the Library continues to be developed, often the plugins that utilize it do not need further updating.

In the case of an Library it works the other way around, the plugin has to be built to use the API in the first place.

Edited February 5, 2017 by Alshain
